column8: I agree. Dont spread our confusion there
DAP is not the ruling party of Sarawak. Didn't even manage to win 2 digit seats there. So shut up.
I think this have to do with reports of some religious teacher from peninsular that try to convert their students
who is he to say that...who to teach those muslim pupils
Dont care, sabah sarawak should be left alone. They are a good example on how multi racial society should live. Unlike here in peninsular. We are a bunch of easily confused people.

Sarawak have sufficient people which has the knowledged to manage their own state. Outsider like peninsular people must not interfere the current good relation in multicultural society in the state. Only those Bangla decendant do not understand about the multicultural society.
cukur dap only become opp party forever in bolehland.
but from political standpoint this is suicide by Dap sarawak, cause you know some quarter will use religion and race card to shed bad to them
I dont think religion card has any affect there. Thats y pas very hard to get any support in s&s.

column7: From: Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster
column8: Nice try, but if you ask the locals, they would also want these peninsula teachers to fuck off in favor of local ones.
